sentences.sContent: The odometer shows now 140 miles per hour.
sentences.sContent_eng: The odometer shows now 140 miles per hour.
sentences.sCn: 里程表显示现在的时速为140英里。

sentences.sContent: We found powdered sugar on the odometer cable.
sentences.sContent_eng: We found powdered sugar on the odometer cable.
sentences.sCn: 我们在里程表的电线上找到糖粉。

sentences.sContent: A consensus fusion algorithm for multi-odometer data is presented to improve in-pipeline location precision of the autonomous pipeline inspection robot.
sentences.sContent_eng: A consensus fusion algorithm for multi-odometer data is presented to improve in-pipeline location precision of the autonomous pipeline inspection robot.
sentences.sCn: 针对自主管道检测机器人的管内定位问题，提出了一种能够提高定位精度的多里程仪测量数据一致性融合方法。

remMethod.val: odo(旅行) + meter(测量) → 测量旅行的东西 → 里程表

trans.tranOther: an instrument in a vehicle that shows how many miles or kilometres the vehicle has travelled
